engExample: See you later at the shop.
Where are you going? To the city?
I’m lost, where is the road?

engExample: Let’s go to the beach at Kovalam.

I like banana chips with tea.

english: What are you doing right now?
engExample: What are you doing right now? Just relaxing?
Have you eaten anything? Don't skip meals.

english: Are you sleeping well these days?
engExample: Are you sleeping well these days? Not staying up late?
malExample: ഇപ്പോഴൊക്കെ നല്ല ഉറക്കം കിട്ടുന്നുണ്ടോ? വൈകി ഉറങ്ങുന്നില്ലല്ലേ?
malExampleTranslit: ippolokke nalla urakkam kittunnundo? vaiki urangunnillaalle?

engExample: How is everyone keeping? No problems na?
malExample: എല്ലാവരും എങ്ങനെ നിൽക്കുന്നു? ഒരു പ്രശ്നവും ഇല്ലല്ലേ?
malExampleTranslit: ellaavarum engane nilkkunnu? oru prashnavum illalle?

engExample: Any news from your side? Tell me something.
malExample: നിങ്ങളുടെ ഭാഗത്ത് എന്തെങ്കിലും വാർത്തയുണ്ടോ? എന്തെങ്കിലും പറയ്.
malExampleTranslit: ningalude bhaagaththu enthenkilum vaarthayundo? enthenkilum paray.

engExample: Did you take your medicine? Don't forget okay?
Are you going out today? Or staying home?
Shall we talk tomorrow? Or evening itself?
Okay then, bye for now. Take care.
Is everything okay there? No tension na?
malExample: അവിടെ എല്ലാം ശരിയാണോ? ഒരു ടെൻഷനും ഇല്ലല്ലേ?
malExampleTranslit: avide ellaam shariyaano? oru tenshanum illalle?

engExample: How is your health now? Feeling better?

english: What did you have for breakfast?
engExample: What did you have for breakfast? Something nice?
Are the kids studying well? Any exams coming?
malExample: കുട്ടികൾ നല്ലപോലെ പഠിക്കുന്നുണ്ടോ? പരീക്ഷ ഉണ്ടോ ഉടൻ?
malExampleTranslit: kuttikal nallapole padikkunnundo? pareeksha undo udan?

english: Did you go for a walk today?
engExample: Did you go for a walk today? Good for health.
How is the voice today? Sounds clear.
malExample: ഇന്ന് ശബ്ദം എങ്ങനെയുണ്ട്? നല്ല ക്ലിയറായി കേൾക്കുന്നു.
malExampleTranslit: innu shabdham enganeyundu? nalla clearaayi kelkkunnu.

engExample: Don't strain yourself okay? Take rest.
malExample: ഒരു അധികം വല്ലാതെ വിഷമിക്കരുത് ഓക്കേ? റസ്റ്റ് എടുക്ക്.
malExampleTranslit: oru adhikam vallathe vishamikkaruthu okke? rest edukku.

english: Call me if you need anything.
engExample: Call me if you need anything. I'm here.
Okay, talk later. Bye for now.
How was your day? Anything special?
malExample: ഇന്നത്തെ ദിവസം എങ്ങനെയായിരുന്നു? എന്തെങ്കിലും സ്പെഷ്യൽ ഉണ്ടായോ?
malExampleTranslit: innatthe divasam enganeyayirunnu? enthenkilum special undaayo?

english: Did you rest in the afternoon?
engExample: Did you rest in the afternoon? Or busy?
How is the mood today? Cheerful?
Any phone call from someone? Who was it?
Don't worry about anything okay? Everything will be fine.
I'll call you later okay? Or you call me.
malExample: പിന്നെ വിളിക്കാം ഓക്കേ? അതോ നീ വിളിക്ക്.
malExampleTranslit: pinne vilikkaam okke? atho nee vilikku.

engExample: Take care of yourself. Don't forget.
Did you drink water? Drink some now.
How is the weather there? Hot or cool?

english: Okay, I'll let you go now.
engExample: Okay, I'll let you go now. Rest well.
malExample: ഓക്കേ ഞാൻ വിടാം. നല്ല റസ്റ്റ് എടുക്ക്.
malExampleTranslit: okke njaan vidaam. nalla rest edukku.

engExample: Are you feeling tired? Take a break.
malExample: നിനക്ക് ക്ഷീണം തോന്നുന്നുണ്ടോ? ഒന്ന് ബ്രേക്ക് എടുക്ക്.
malExampleTranslit: ninakku ksheenam thonunnundo? onnu break edukku.

engExample: Did you watch anything nice? Some serial?
Don't be alone too much. Call someone.
I'm missing you all. When can we meet?
malExample: എല്ലാവരെയും മിസ്സ് ചെയ്യുന്നു. എപ്പോഴാ കാണാൻ പറ്റുക?
malExampleTranslit: ellaavareyum miss cheyyunnu. eppozhaa kaanaan pattuka?

engExample: Take care and sleep early. Good night.
How is your appetite? Eating well?
Don't worry too much. Everything is okay.

english: I'll call you in the evening.
engExample: I'll call you in the evening. Okay?

malExampleTranslit: good night, sweet dreams. nalla urakkam.

engExample: How is the day going? Busy?
Are you feeling okay? Any tiredness?
Don't forget to drink water. Stay hydrated.
I'll be thinking of you. Call me anytime.

malExampleTranslit: ivide ninnu good night. sweet dreams.

engExample: How is your back today? Better?

engExample: How is your energy level? Feeling fresh?

english: I'll call you in a bit.
engExample: I'll call you in a bit. Stay there.

engExample: I'll call back soon. Stay near the phone.

engExample: How is the head today? No headache?

malExampleTranslit: ippol relax aano? atho ippolum thirakkaano?

engExample: Don't forget to rest. You need it.
I'm always here for you. Call anytime.

engExample: How is your energy? Feeling good?

malExampleTranslit: njaan thirichu vilikkaam. oru nimisham kaaththirikk.

engExample: Love you so much. Bye now.
